data.name: AnilistSearchQuery
CreateAnimeTable
data.value: CREATE TABLE 'anime_entries' ( 'id' integer not null primary key, 'id_mal' integer, 'average_score' integer, 'episodes' integer, 'duration' integer, 'type' string, 'format' string, 'status' string, 'description' string, 'genres' string, 'synonyms' string, 'title_english' string, 'title_romaji' string, 'title_native' string, 'start_date' text, 'end_date' text, 'cover_image' string, 'viewing_status' string, 'personal_score' integer, 'personal_review' string, 'watch_priority' integer, 'rewatch_count' integer, 'current_episode' integer, 'date_added' text, 'is_adult' integer, 'next_airing_episode' string, 'external_links' string )

data.name: CreateMangaTable
data.value: CREATE TABLE 'manga_entries' ( 'id' integer not null primary key, 'id_mal' integer, 'average_score' integer, 'volumes' integer, 'chapters' integer, 'type' string, 'format' string, 'status' string, 'description' string, 'genres' string, 'synonyms' string, 'title_english' string, 'title_romaji' string, 'title_native' string, 'cover_image' string, 'reading_status' string, 'personal_score' integer, 'personal_review' string, 'read_priority' integer, 'reread_count' integer, 'current_chapter' integer, 'date_added' text, 'is_adult' integer, 'external_links' string )

data.name: DisclaimerMessage
